Module com.example.pa
Package com.example.controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.InventoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class InventoryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A class that shows the main inventory controller screen and allows the user to add, modify, or delete parts and products. RUNTIME ERROR: Placed in the catch portion of the code for the onPartSearch method. Thought a popup box would appear, but it did not. Went with text area instead of: Alert onPartSearch = new Alert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION); onPartSearch.setTitle("Not a Match"); onPartSearch.setHeaderText("Not a match"); onPartSearch.setContentText("No such product exists"); FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Create a method to switch between screens to prevent repeat of code throughout program. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Create a method to make the confirmation alerts more generic to reduce repeat of code throughout program. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Allow user to select multiple rows to delete rather than a single row at a time.

  • Method Details

    • onClickPartModify

      public void onClickPartModify(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      A method that allows a user to select a part to modify by selecting a part and then pressing the modify button. User will be taken to the modify part screen. If no part has been selected, a message will appear in the text area of the screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - go to modify part screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onClickProductModify

      public void onClickProductModify(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      A method that allows a user to select a product to modify by selecting a product and then pressing the modify button. User will be taken to the modify product screen. If no product has been selected, a message will appear in the text area of the screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - go to modify product screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onPartSearch

      public void onPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      A method that allows the user to search for a part. If the name search doesn't result in a match, the method will search for the part ID. If no search result is found, a message appears in the text area. Once user presses "Enter", the table repopulates.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - search for part.

    • onProductSearch

      public void onProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      A method that allows the user to search for a product. If the name search doesn't result in a match, the method will search for the product ID. If no search result is found, a message appears in the text area. Once user presses "Enter", the table repopulates.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - search product.

    • onClickPartAdd

      public void onClickPartAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      A method that loads the add part screen when the user clicks on "Add" button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - go to add part screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onClickPartDelete

      public void onClickPartDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      A method that deletes the selected part when user clicks the delete button and confirms they wish to delete.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete part from the parts table.

    • onClickProductDelete

      public void onClickProductDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      A method that deletes the selected product when user clicks the delete button and confirms they wish to delete.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - product from the products table
